alert.note: Alert for Southern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hidalgo and south central Starr Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Garciasville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palmview, Penitas, Sullivan City, La Joya, Palmhurst, Los Ebanos, Garciasville, Alton, La Grulla and Narciso G. Cavazos Elementary School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
